pages.text: Fuel the station with ores or rare crafting materials and sacrifice a piece of gear (even common will do!).$(br)The resulting piece of gear is a random piece but it has a high chance to be the same type as the sacrificed piece of gear. $(br)So if you are lacking a certain piece, collect commons and sacrifice them! $(br)Fuels include: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Epic, Legenday and Mythic ores, plus vanilla items like Diamonds, Gold Ingots etc.
